subject: URG: ATTN: Beneficiary,
body:
URG: ATTN: Beneficiary,
We have been directed by the British government and European union to pay you the sum of US$10M for scam victim/attempted scam victim compensation fund without delays.
This payment is unconditional fund payment as you will not be requested to send any money before the fund would be transferred/paid to you.
If you are requested to pay any money at any time, we from the British Government will assist you to pay it for you or we proffer solution as directed by European Union and you will repay us back a month after you must have received your compensation fund valued US$10M in any of your designated bank account.
To avoid had I know, I was not told or I was ignorant, you are advised to quickly respond to this mail by sending your below information for more details and urgent follow up in your compensation fund payment.
1. Your names in full
2. Your house addresses
3. Your working mobile phone number.
Your response is being awaited.
God bless you and Have a great day,
Yours truly,
 
Mr. Paul Boardman.
Jan, 2024.
SCAM VICTIM IMMEDIATE UNCONDITIONAL COMPENSATION FUND PAYMENT/URGENT FOLLOW UP

subject: Re:   URG: ATTN: Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Mr. Paul Boardman,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the scam victim fund payment. I appreciate your efforts in assisting me with this matter. Before proceeding, I would like to ask a few questions to ensure that everything is legitimate.

1. Can you please provide more information about how the British government and European Union are involved in this fund payment?

2. What is the process for receiving the fund? Are there any specific documents or forms that need to be filled out?

3. How long does it usually take for the fund to be transferred into my designated bank account once all the necessary steps have been completed?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on this matter.

Best wishes,
Catherine

subject: Re: MODALITIES OF YOUR MODALITIES OF YOUR COMPENSATION FUND PAYMENT/URGENT REPLY FUND PAYMENT/URGENT REPLY
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the scam victim fund. I appreciate the information you have provided. It's interesting to hear that the British government and European Union are involved in this initiative.

I understand that there may be some charges, fines, or fees associated with receiving the fund. Could you please provide more details about these charges? I would like to know how they are calculated and what they cover.

You mentioned that a credible financier will provide a loan to cover these charges. How does this process work? Can you explain more about the terms of the loan and how it will be repaid?

I want to ensure that everything is done legally and transparently, so any additional information you can provide would be helpful. Please let me know how we can proceed further.

Best wishes,
Catherine
